message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $9,500 is significantly below its true value. I can be somewhat flexible, so how about we meet in the middle at $10,750?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $10,750. How about we meet at $10,200?
